Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| PC 70 BM blends |

In the revised paragraph, only one clear "Material Name" entity is mentioned: "PC 70 BM blends". The other entity, "polymers", is too vague and general to be considered a specific material name. Therefore, I have removed it from the list of valid entities.
